P3.Player

  • 使用Player的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    P3  

    • P3中Player的使用

      返回Player的P3中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Player goGame.getOpponent(java.lang.String name) 
      Player Game.getOpponent(java.lang.String name)
      get the opponent player
      Player chessGame.getOpponent(java.lang.String name) 
      Player goGame.getPlayer1() 
      Player Game.getPlayer1()
      Get player1
      Player chessGame.getPlayer1() 
      Player goGame.getPlayer2() 
      Player Game.getPlayer2()
      Get player2
      Player chessGame.getPlayer2() 
      参数类型为Player的P3中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      static boolean MyChessAndGoGame.gameAction(Game game, Player player, boolean move, boolean chess)
      gameAction will execute a move action or a kill action.
      boolean goGame.kill(Player executor, Position source, Position target) 
      boolean chessGame.kill(Player player, Position source, Position target) 
      boolean Action.kill(Player player, Position source, Position target)
      Chess: kill a piece in the target position with the piece in the source position, the executor is player Go: kill a piece in the target position, assume the source is null
      boolean goGame.move(Player executor, Position source, Position target) 
      boolean chessGame.move(Player player, Position source, Position target) 
      boolean Action.move(Player player, Position source, Position target)
      Chess: move a piece from the source position to the target position, the executor is player Go: move a piece to the target position, assume the source is null
